
#Lesula

![Lesula image](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/aa67a3ac-9666-402a-a623-f1961ce4f4db/dbk1myf-adab5d97-7cc3-4d41-9d90-36998b55650c.jpg/v1/fit/w_597,h_752,q_70,strp/lesula_by_willemsvdmerwe_dbk1myf-375w-2x.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..o_XId2uKHeqA1s3WWd4bJ6tWxseaswxXoJXYmOrC7lQ)

The lesula is a species of Old World monkey in the guenon genus Cercopithecus, found in the Lomami Basin of the Congo. Though known to locals, it was unknown to the international scientific community until it was discovered in 2007 and confirmed in a 2012 publication.
